SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ClientImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, ViewListener, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class ClientImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Client, ViewListener, Runnable
This class indicates the client's implementation. It is an extension of the UnicastRemoteObject and also a ModelListener's implementation. It contains methods that implements all the client's functionalities described in the client's interface class (and methods used for forwarding notifications from view to the server, ...).
See Also:
  • Client
  • ModelListener
  • UnicastRemoteObject
  • Serialized Form

    • ClientImpl

      public ClientImpl(Server server, UI view, String nickname, int port, RMIClientSocketFactory csf, RMIServerSocketFactory ssf) throws RemoteException
      Class constructor. initialize the client's server, client's view and nickname to the given values. initialize the server's ip and port to the given values. Registers the view's listener.
      Parameters:
      server - the current server.
      view - the UI's view.
      nickname - the client's (player's) nickname.
      port - the server's port number.
      csf - the client socket factory employed for the RMI.
      ssf - the server socket factory employed for the RMI.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
      See Also:
      • Server
      • RMIClientSocketFactory
      • RMIServerSocketFactory
      • Server
      • UI
      • Player.getNickname()
